title: Whole team of Bots in ARAM game.
body: I enter an ARAM game, against a full team of human players, only to realise my entire team was bots. From orianna ulting minion waves to ziggs running in on 70 health and annie to go 0/18, it was insane. And playing sion, I couldn't do much about it. :c

replies.body: Its aram, shouldn't be too worried bout it
I haven't seen bots in an ARAM game, but I have seen bots in co-op vs ai, where my whole team were bots, that fed and we lost the game
